properties.name: items
properties.description: Array<Object>, required. Items to display on the Menu.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Set variable for close menu on icon close

properties.name: menuSelectMode
properties.description: Set mode in that items will be scrollable

properties.name: searchMode
properties.description: Set search mode in that items won't be scrollable, will displaying only 4 items and available search by items title field
